panels.title: Indexstore Component Methods Call Error Rate
Chunkstore Component Methods Call Error Rate

targets.expr: sum(bee_localstore_method_calls{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", component="cachestore", status="failure"}) by (method) / sum(bee_localstore_method_calls{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", component="cachestore"}) by (method)
